p: There were no differences in the daily feed intake, daily GE intake and daily GE loss in urine among pigs fed different CGM diets ( Table 4). However, the daily feces output was lower (p = 0.02) for pigs fed CGM 1, CGM 3, CGM 5, and CGM 8 than those fed CGM 9, and the daily GE loss in feces was lower (p< 0.01) for pigs fed CGM 1, CGM 5, and CGM 8 than those fed CGM 9.
